TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MuxLogger extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.INodeLogger
type MuxLogger = class interface INodeLogger interface ILogger

span.span: Represents a multiplexing logger.

summary.span: 在生成过程中，该记录器的用途是注册和注销多个记录器。

span.span: The purpose of this logger is to register and unregister multiple loggers during the build.

summary.span: 支持 Visual Studio IDE 方案，通过该方案为每个项目系统的生成请求注册和注销记录器。

span.span: Supports the Visual Studio IDE scenario in which loggers are registered and unregistered for each project system's build request.

summary.span: 一个物理生成能拥有多个逻辑生成，每个都带有它自己的记录器集。

span.span: One physical build can have multiple logical builds, each with its own set of loggers.

summary.span: 作为一般中心/l 样式记录器向生成管理器注册自身。

span.span: The registers itself with the build manager as a regular central /l style logger.

summary.span: 根据消息来自的逻辑生成，它从生成管理器中接收消息并将它们发送到正确的记录器上。

span.span: It receives messages from the build manager and routes them to the correct logger, based on the logical build that the message came from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MuxLogger`通常函数，如下所示：The `MuxLogger` generally functions as follows: - `MuxLogger`注册生成管理器开始生成的开始处。The `MuxLogger` is registered at the beginning of the build manager's Begin build. 注册，然后生成管理器中启动该构建任何记录器获取生成开始事件在同一时间作为`MuxLogger`。Any loggers registered before the build manager starts the build get the build-started event at the same time as the `MuxLogger`. 生成管理器中启动该构建后注册任何记录器获取合成的生成开始的事件。Any loggers registered after the build manager starts the build get a synthesized build-started event. 不能缓存该事件，因为生成开始事件时间戳在创建事件时，并缓存该事件会在注册到记录器中为错误的生成时间时确定`MuxLogger`。The event cannot be cached because the timestamp of the build-started event is determined when the event is created, and caching the event would give incorrect build times in the loggers registered to the `MuxLogger`. - `MuxLogger`初始化生成管理器The `MuxLogger` is initialized by the build manager `MuxLogger`从生成管理器侦听事件源上的所有事件，并且正确地将事件路由到已注册的记录器。The `MuxLogger` listens to all events on the event source from the build manager and routes events correctly to the registered loggers. - `MuxLogger`完成生成后在最终版本中已关闭。The `MuxLogger` is shutdown when the build is finished in end build. 在此期间，它将注销附加到它的任何记录器。At this time, it unregisters any loggers attached to it. - `MuxLogger`记录生成完成事件时为每个记录器看到第一个项目启动事件的项目完成事件。The `MuxLogger` logs the build-finished event when the project-finished event for the first project-started event is seen for each logger. `MuxLogger`按以下方式注册的记录器：The `MuxLogger` registers loggers in the following way: 1. 记录器传递给`MuxLogger.RegisterLogger`方法用于将消息路由到该记录器的提交 ID。The logger is passed to the `MuxLogger.RegisterLogger` method with a submission ID that is used to route a message to that logger. 2. `MuxLogger`注册到记录器`MuxLogger`事件源。The `MuxLogger` registers the logger to the `MuxLogger` event source. 3. 如果已记录生成开始的事件、`MuxLogger`创建新的生成开始的事件，并将其发送到记录器的事件源。If the build-started event has already been logged, the `MuxLogger` creates a new build-started event and sends it to the logger's event source. `MuxLogger`注销记录器，如下所示：The `MuxLogger` unregisters loggers in the following way: 1. 完成生成提交后，`MuxLogger.UnregisterLogger`记录器方法调用使用提交 ID。When a build submission is completed, the `MuxLogger.UnregisterLogger` method is called with the submission ID for the logger. 2. `MuxLogger`提交 id 查找项目完成事件的成功状态并记录到的记录器生成完成事件。The `MuxLogger` looks up the success state of the project-finished event for the submission ID and logs a build-finished event to the logger. 3. `MuxLogger`清理事件源。The `MuxLogger` cleans up the event source. 请注意，取消注册来自日志记录线程以外的线程是否记录事件时，会调用取消注册，可能出现同步问题。Note that the unregister comes from a thread other than the logging thread and a synchronization issue could occur if unregister is called while events are being logged.
